segments.text: From my spot, the kitchen looks like a chaotic playground, yet so ordinary.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The water pouring over the sink creates an accidental fountain of sorts.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: I can almost hear the quiet giggles of the children as they plot their cookie heist.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: And there’s the woman, blissfully unaware, lost in her simple task.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: I can’t help but think how different this scene could be if she just turned around.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: Every moment feels like a balancing act with the boy on that unstable stool.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: I wonder if he realizes the risks he’s taking for a piece of cookie.
segments.speaker: PAR
